contents:
Dear who may concern

Please allow me to mention that universities and students are facing extreme violence in HK. Many students are injured and unreasonable arrest by HK police, until now more than 100 students still are besieging in PolyU campus which almost 3 days. Police cut off the water and power supply, at the same time, they refused any medic support into the campus.

Now, the Technology University Berlin's student union has publicly supported these students in HK(https://asta.tu-berlin.de/aktuelles/wir-als-asta-technischen-universit-t-berlin-solidarisieren-uns-mit-studierenden).

Please STAND WITH HK STUDENTS, STAND WITH DEMOCRACY AND FREEDOM! 


Kind Regards,

Someone cares about Hong Kong and Human Rights. (XXX)


英语一般，看没人先动手，那我就露丑了。
